creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: three figures in foreground with two oxen pulling cart; tan and brown buildings and foliage in middle ground; orange-yellow buildings blending into side of bluff in background; brilliant blue sky
medium: Woodblock print; ink and colors on paper
title: Gwalior
